json
{
  "name": "bibliotheque-api",

  "description": "API REST pour gérer une bibliothèque",

    "test": "mvn test",
    "start": "mvn spring-boot:run"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "spring-boot-starter-web": "^2.5.2",
    "spring-boot-starter-data-jpa": "^2.5.2",
    "spring-boot-starter-security": "^2.5.2",
    "javax.validation:validation-api:2.0.1.Final",
    "org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-swagger:2.5.2",
    "io.springfox:springfox-swagger-ui:3.0.0",
    "postgresql:postgresql:42.2.23",
    "com.auth0:java-jwt:3.18.3",
    "org.projectlombok:lombok:1.18.20",
    "org.projectlombok:lombok-maven-plugin:1.18.20",

    "org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine:5.7.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-test:2.5.2",
    "net.bytebuddy:byte-buddy:1.11.7",
    "org.mockito:mockito-core:3.12.4",
